EmailTemplate.subject: Registration for training and CRB documents needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
REMINDER: WE NEED INFORMATION FROM YOU
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for submitting your preferred wave choices for your summer role. We have noticed that you have not yet registered for training. Please do so as soon as possible to secure your role.
TRAINING During training, you will learn all you need to know about The Challenge and your role. You will also meet the people that you will be working with this summer. Please note that the training event lasts for 4 days. Please confirm your attendance at your training session as soon as possible to confirm that you would like to accept this offer.
http://thechallenge.secure.force.com/AvailableDates?key={!Job_Application__c.ContactId__c}&Type={!Job_Application__c.00NC0000005EVyp}&JType={!Job_Application__c.Id}
We now also need your documents in order to process your enhanced CRB check. It is very important that you send scanned copies of your documents as soon as possible as your role with us is dependant on a satisfactory CRB. We now also need your documents in order to process your enhanced CRB check. It is very important that you send scanned copies of your documents as soon as possible as your role with us is dependant on a satisfactory CRB.
In order to apply for your CRB, please follow these instructions. Please note that you do not need to enter a password.
1. Visit www.carecheck.co.uk 2. Click on the Applicant tab 3. Please read all the notes and instructions 4. Click on Click here to continue 5. Click on Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) Application Form 6. Click on Start a New Application 7. Enter the Organisation Reference: evolutionrecruitment 8. Enter your personal information to apply for the CRB check.
Please submit your documents for verification on the below form. Please go to http://carecheck.arrangementcms.co.uk/index.php?node=ID-Rules for information on which documents can be accepted. We also request that you submit your dietary requirements and any medical information (such as allergies) that we need to know about, so that we can cater for you during training and during your role on The Challenge.
If you already have an enhanced CRB, we will accept it if the document is dated 1 September 2011 or later. Please submit a scanned copy through the online form
We also request that you submit your dietary requirements and any medical information (such as allergies) that we need to know about, so that we can cater for you during training and during your role on The Challenge.
Please click on the link below to submit your scanned documents and any information that we need to know in order meet your medical and dietary needs while you are with us. http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3b1353e7938ac86&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2={!Job_Application__c.Id}
If, after repeated attempts, you are not able to upload your documents, please email them to crb@the-challenge.org
We look forward to seeing you again at training.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
